import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Navbar = () => { return ( <>
useContext
    `nav-link ${isActive? 'active': ''}`}> Home `nav-link ${isActive? 'active': ''}`}> About `nav-link ${isActive? 'active': ''}`}> Login
{/* Home About Login */} ) } export default Navbar
